body:
Hey guys! I've been getting a few requests from both people on Skype and in-game about making more videos, since my last one was like 3 weeks ago. So, I sat down last night and went through some footage that I haven't used yet, then put together a new intro in After Effects. Here's my new montage video :D

If you liked this video, please like the video and subscribe, it really means a lot to me <3

http://youtu.be/V4sviQDBDhU
